thread.section_title: Carflexi Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Carflexi | carflexi.com
thread.title: Leonie Wilkinson

author: Leonie Wilkinson
title: Leonie Wilkinson
text: Chose Car flexi because of ease of use of website, they had everything we required, good price, wifi option rather than gps and cheaper than gps! taking over the border, second driver, unlimited kms. Happy with price, brilliant service met at Lisbon airport, shuttle to the interrent car hire. quick efficient, thorough. Car had a few scratches which we took photos of prior to accepting car, they suggested we paid the $1 per day for auto toll, (this is a must as lots of tolls in Portugal) explained everything. We washed car and filled with fuel upon return. no issues again quick and efficient and shuttled us back to airport. thoroughly recommend this company
